summary: This document details the account information for Southern Financial LLC and Southern Trust Company, Inc., including ownership and structure. It mentions Jeffrey Epstein in the context of financial products and compliance checks, highlighting concerns related to solicitation of prostitution that were escalated to compliance officers.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Jeffrey Epstein is mentioned as an account holder associated with Southern Financial LLC and Southern Trust Company, Inc., indicating his involvement in financial activities.

persons.name: Chip Packard
persons.context: Chip Packard is referenced as an AML Compliance officer who approved the escalation of concerns regarding solicitation of prostitution.

persons.name: Pat Harris
persons.context: Pat Harris is mentioned as another AML Compliance officer involved in the review of the solicitation concerns.

persons.name: Armen Brash
persons.context: Armen Brash is noted as the individual who completed the KYC checklist for Epstein's accounts.

connections.description: Jeffrey Epstein's financial activities were reviewed by Chip Packard in the context of AML compliance.
Pat Harris was involved in the compliance review related to Epstein's financial activities.
Armen Brash conducted the KYC checklist review for Epstein's accounts.

events.title: KYC Review for Epstein Accounts
events.description: A KYC review was conducted for accounts associated with Jeffrey Epstein, revealing concerns about solicitation of prostitution.

keyFacts: The document details account information for Southern Financial LLC and Southern Trust Company, Inc.
Jeffrey Epstein is identified as an account holder with significant financial involvement.
Concerns regarding solicitation of prostitution were escalated to AML Compliance officers.
The document is marked confidential and is for internal use only.
The approval date for the document is August 20, 2013.
